about.summary: Survival models may have very different structures. This package contains functions  for creating a unified representation of a survival models, which can be further processed by various  survival explainers. Tools implemented in 'survxai' help to understand how input variables are used in  the model and what impact do they have on the final model prediction. Currently, four explanation methods are implemented.  We can divide them into two groups: local and global.

name: r-survxai
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.2.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-survxai
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: survxai_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/survxai_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/survxai/survxai_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 10220b18ffe37021f623f9f641dc2a24c592b69fdee3151ba2b84cbd403c5327

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1002
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-breakdown
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-pec
    - r-prodlim
    - r-scales
    - r-survival
    - r-survminer
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-breakdown
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-pec
    - r-prodlim
    - r-scales
    - r-survival
    - r-survminer

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('survxai')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('survxai')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://mi2datalab.github.io/survxai/
  license: GPL
  summary: 'Survival models may have very different structures. This package contains functions  for
    creating a unified representation of a survival models, which can be further processed
    by various  survival explainers. Tools implemented in ''survxai'' help to understand
    how input variables are used in  the model and what impact do they have on the final
    model prediction. Currently, four explanation methods are implemented.  We can divide
    them into two groups: local and global.'
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - johanneskoester
    - bgruening
    - daler
    - jdblischak
    - cbrueffer
    - dbast
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
